name: Pixiescape
description:
Pixiescape is an asymmetrical multiplayer game, inspired by games like hide and seek or cops and robbers, where you play as a Fairy (hiding team) or a Robot (seeking team).



While playing as a fairy, the player will be able to build enchanted mushrooms (each with their own special effects), shoot magical orbs, or use their spells to evade getting captured.





Should the fairies get caught, they will be teleported to a jail where they can be rescued by remaining ally fairies.



While playing as a robot, the player's objective is to capture all fairies as quickly as possible. Robots can choose to equip skills from a completely different set of abilities such as a grapple hook, energy orbs that smash mushrooms, a scanner to detect hidden fairies, and many others.



Once all fairies are captured, a 2nd round will begin where the players will switch roles. (Robots become fairies, fairies become robots)
The second team to play as fairies must outlast the first team's time to claim victory.

Team sizes can vary:
  • 1v1
  • 2v2
  • 3v3



  • Both single-player and multiplayer modes are available (however, we strongly recommend playing with friends, as this tends to enhance the experience). You can also fill any remaining spots with AI.

  • Take advantage of our extensive customization options to create a unique look that suits you. All items are unlockable with the in-game currency acquired from playing.



  • 21 unique abilities between the two characters

  • 6 diversified arenas to play on
